description: Ralph Ultra v2.4 - Workflow Polish: Skip to story, recent projects list, session management, and improved status display

userStories.title: Skip to specific story
userStories.description: Allow users to jump directly to any story in the PRD using a keyboard shortcut. When in the sessions pane with stories listed, pressing 'g' should prompt for a story number or ID, then jump directly to that story. Useful for debugging specific stories or resuming work.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Pressing 'g' in sessions pane activates goto mode
User can type story number to jump to
Invalid story number shows error feedback

userStories.title: Recent projects list
userStories.description: Track and display recently opened projects for quick access. Store the last 10 projects in settings. Show a recent projects section in the projects rail or as a separate overlay accessible via keyboard shortcut.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Recent projects are stored in settings
Function to add project to recent list exists

userStories.title: Clear session command
userStories.description: Add ability to clear/reset the current session state. This should reset scroll positions, clear log buffers, and optionally clear the PRD progress (with confirmation). Accessible via keyboard shortcut or command palette.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Keyboard shortcut or command triggers clear

acceptanceCriteria.testCommand: grep -qi 'confirm\|are you sure\|warning.*clear' src/components/App.tsx || test -f src/components/ConfirmDialog.tsx

userStories.title: Claude API status in StatusBar
userStories.description: Display the current Claude API status in the StatusBar. Show a colored indicator (green=operational, yellow=degraded, red=outage). Clicking or pressing a key should show more details. Status should be cached and refreshed every 5 minutes.

acceptanceCriteria.text: StatusBar imports and uses status-check module
